docs.lead_paragraph: The New York State Legislature abruptly adjourned for the night late Thursday without voting on any high-profile measures, including same-sex marriage.

headline.seo: Still No Decision on Same-Sex Marriage; Lawmakers Will Return to Albany Friday
headline.main: With No Decision on Same-Sex Marriage, Lawmakers Adjourn for Night
headline.print_headline: Lawmakers in Albany Adjourn for Night Without Deciding on Same-Sex Marriage

docs.snippet: The New York State Legislature abruptly adjourned for the night late Thursday without voting on any high-profile measures, including same-sex marriage.

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject

byline.original: By DANNY HAKIM and THOMAS KAPLAN
